title: ShinnType
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : ShinnType**

ShinnType was founded in 1999 by [Nick Shinn](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nick%20Shinn), to publish his original type designs. Prior to that, his types had been published by a number of different companies.

ShinnType fonts are distributed by [Faces](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Faces), [FontHaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontHaus), [Fonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fonts.com), [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop), [Fontworks](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fontworks), [Phil's Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Phil%27s%20Fonts), [Myfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Myfonts), and [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veer).

ShinnType has released 14 retail typeface families (113 fonts): Artefact, Alphaville, Beaufort, Bodoni Egyptian, Brown Gothic, Eunoia, Goodchild, Handsome, Morphica, Nicholas, Panoptica, Preface, Walburn, and Worldwide.

ShinnType has also designed many exclusive commissioned typefaces, including: Aldo, BN Gothic, Nelson, Richler, and Tribune Century.

ShinnType also does custom logotype and lettering work, especially newspaper mastheads.

ShinnType is located in [Toronto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Toronto), [Canada](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Canada).

website: [http://shinntype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204220219/http:/shinntype.com/ "http://shinntype.com/")
author: Nick Shinn
